âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Drawing tools (Pencil, Eraser, Fill, Eyedropper, Rectangle, Ellipse) â€¢ Canvas with zoom, editable background color, and optional grid â€¢ Undo/Redo with history â€¢ Drag & drop image opening â€¢ Real-time preview
ðŸ“– Summary: Tilf is a free and open-source pixel art editor built with PySide6, designed for creating sprites, icons, and small 2D assets. It offers essential drawing tools, live preview, undo/redo functionality, and various export options, aiming for a lightweight and dependency-free experience across Windows, MacOS, and GNU/Linux.
